title: Polymarket Traders See 89% Chance of SEC Approving Spot BTC ETF by Jan. 15
description: Some investors have bought the "No side shares" of the prediction contract to hedge against potential delays in the SEC's approval of spot ETFs.

title: Bitcoin Is an ‘Intriguing Option for National and Corporate Financial Portfolios’ Says Billionaire Stelian Balta
description: Stelian Balta, the billionaire and co-founder of the digital asset management firm Hyperchain Capital, has said that while bitcoin is indeed a volatile asset it nonetheless helps to diversify and align an investment portfolio with digital trends. The top crypto asset’s high-return possibilities also “makes it an intriguing option for national and corporate financial portfolios,” […]

title: China tightens grip on crypto with cold storage regulations
description: The Chinese media has recently highlighted a growing concern regarding the misuse of cryptocurrencies by corrupt officials. A particular point of worry is using cold storage methods, which allow these individuals to secretly move assets out of the country. Cold storage, a technique for keeping cryptocurrency keys and addresses offline, is now seen as a […]

title: Capcom Teases Street Fighter 6 DLC Character Akuma for 2024 Release
description: Street Fighter fans worldwide have been eagerly awaiting the arrival of Akuma as the next DLC character in Street Fighter 6. While his inclusion was announced in 2023, the exact release date had been shrouded in mystery, with Capcom merely stating that he would appear in “Spring 2024.”  However, to kick off the new year, […]

title: Bitcoin Hits New Yearly High At $45,899 Amid Expectations Of ETF Approval
description: Today, Bitcoin, the largest cryptocurrency by market value, surpassed the $45,000 mark, reaching a notable $45,899 level. Investors’ optimism about the potential approval of spot Bitcoin Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) in the US played a substantial role in driving this notable surge. Several factors, including the influx of funds into […]

title: Bitcoin Faces Critical On-Chain Support and Resistance Levels: What Lies Ahead?
description: Bitcoin faces two critical on-chain levels that could dictate its short-term price movement. Crypto analyst Ali has pointed out two major “supply walls” that set up the digital asset for a major breakout. Bitcoin (BTC) has begun the year on a bullish note. title: Could ORDI Sink to Single Digits? Market Weighs Risks and Opportunities
description:
The ORDI token, minted on the Bitcoin network using the BRC-20 standard, recently reached a new high of $81.96. This surge was followed by a decline in value of over 10%, sparking widespread discussion in the crypto community.  Despite this volatility, ORDI has shown remarkable resilience, with a 12.95% increase over the past week. These […]

title: Ripple and SEC Have Court Dates Slated for Feb, Mar, and Apr 2024
description:
In a recent YouTube update, crypto analyst Zach Humphries outlined the anticipated timeline for the ongoing legal battle between Ripple Labs and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in 2024.  Humphries believes court developments in Ripple vs. SEC this year could shape the industry’s fate. He noted that February 12 would be the date […]
